org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css

Class CSSRgbColorPropertyValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.common.SourceLocation
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css.CSSPropertyValue
        • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css.CSSRgbColorPropertyValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISourceLocation, ICSSNode, ICSSPropertyValue

    public class CSSRgbColorPropertyValue
extends CSSPropertyValue
    Implementation for CSS rgb (0,0,0) property values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<ICSSNode> children
      A list of children nodes.

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected CSSRgbColorPropertyValue(String rawRgb, org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree tree, org.antlr.runtime.TokenStream tokenStream)
      Create a color property value from AST with rgb color value such as rgb(100%, 0%, 0%) .

      • getRawRgb

        public String getRawRgb()
        Get the original rgb definition in the CSS document.

        For example: 255,0,0, 100%,0,0, 255,0,100%.

        Returns:
        Original rgb property value text in the CSS document.
